sentences.en: Also low - temperature sintering mechanism and the method of raising wearability was described in this paper.
sentences.cn: 并着重讨论了低温烧成的机理,探讨了提高耐磨性的途径.

sentences.en: And heel is main index with wearability, requirement wear and tear is small.
sentences.cn: 并且鞋跟以耐磨性为主要指标, 要求磨耗小.

sentences.en: Anti - impact , wearability, chemical corrosion protection , water vapor penetration prevention . Easily adapt itself to the environment.
sentences.cn: 抗冲击、耐磨损 、 耐化学腐蚀 、 耐水汽渗透等性能好, 环境适应能力强.

sentences.en: Composite electrodeposits have been principally used to improve the corrosion resistance and wearability of metal surface.
sentences.cn: 复合镀层主要用于提高金属表面的耐蚀性和耐磨性.

sentences.en: Describes briefly the two main aspects of clothing wearability researches, i.
sentences.cn: 简要论述服装功能研究的两个方面:服装心理学与服装生理学.

sentences.en: Designs will be judged according to originality, wearability, the creative use of diamonds and technical skill.
sentences.cn: 预设将被判断根据原创性, 耐磨性, 钻石和技术技术创造性地使用.

sentences.en: Employing abrasive machining for the form of the gear and intellective-control carburizing and quenching technology for the surface, the gear is with high intensity, strong tenacity and wearability.
sentences.cn: 齿轮齿形采用磨齿加工，齿面采用智能控制渗碳淬火技术，齿轮的强度高、韧性和耐磨性好。

sentences.en: Experiment results show that the coating has good adhesion, low porosity, excellent wearability and corrosion resistence.
sentences.cn: 测试结果表明:镀层结合力强 、 孔隙率极低 、 硬度高、耐磨性能好、耐蚀性能优良.

sentences.en: It has the characteristics of light weight, good wet proof behaviour and wearability, high usable frequency.
sentences.cn: 它具有重量轻 、 抗湿性能好、耐磨性能好 、 使用率高、便于施工和保证混凝土表面质量等特点.

sentences.en: Its slip resistance and durability provide stability and long term wearability .
sentences.cn: 它的滑性和耐久性提供稳定和长期的耐磨性。

sentences.en: New rib and lug type pattem ensures an excellent compositive performances , liwer rolling resistance, high - speed riding ability, heat - resistance, wearability.
sentences.cn: 纵横混合花纹具备优越的综合性能, 滚动阴力低,行驶速度快, 优良的耐热和耐磨耗性能, 有很高的经济实用性.

sentences.en: The coating has good tenacity and wearability.
sentences.cn: 涂层具有良好的韧性和耐磨性能.

sentences.en: The finishing can improve the shrinking rate, wearability, crease - resistant and bend - resistant of the cotton fabric.
sentences.cn: 丝素整理能够改善棉织物的尺寸稳定性 、 耐磨性 、 抗折 皱回复性、抗弯刚度等性能.

sentences.en: The of amount of fine graphite enhances the roll's resistance ot spalling, thermal crack and wearability.
sentences.cn: 加上有少量细小,不仅提高了轧辊抗剥落性, 抗热裂性和耐磨性能,而且辊身工作层硬度落差很小.

sentences.en: This paper presents the design specification, style , weaving, dyeing, finishing and wearability of such serial fabrics.
sentences.cn: 本文介绍了多功能改性聚酯长丝系列织物的设计规格 、 风格特征 、 织造及染色后整理工艺和织物服用性能.

sentences.en: Using this method , the porous body maintain its original porosity when its surface wearability is improved.
sentences.cn: 渗硼的多孔体保持了原有的孔隙特性,并提高了表面耐磨性.
